feed.title: Invoice Ninja Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Invoice Ninja: v5.10.21
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Rate limit invoice actions
  • Improve gateway fee confirmation
  • Updated mail history queries
  • Small fixes for payment email logic
  • Add payment balance as an accessible variable by @turbo124 in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/9883
  • Add log time to task exports by @turbo124 in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/9891
  • Add search on product_key and notes via query filters by @turbo124 in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/9898
  • v5.10.21 by @turbo124 in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/9899

Full Changelog: https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/compare/v5.10.20...v5.10.21

entry.title: New release for Invoice Ninja: v5.10.22
New release for Invoice Ninja: v5.10.23
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Fixes for locking invoices + calculate taxes.
  • v5.10.23 by @turbo124 in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/9908

Full Changelog: https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/compare/v5.10.22...v5.10.23

entry.title: New release for Invoice Ninja: v5.10.24
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Cache busting for react after self-update
  • Fixes for $0 subscriptions
  • Add auth guard for activity records
  • v5.10.24 by @turbo124 in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/9911

Full Changelog: https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/compare/v5.10.23...v5.10.24

entry.title: New release for Invoice Ninja: v5.10.25
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Fixes for ZUGFeRD by @LarsK1 in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/9914
  • Update translations by @beganovich in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/9912
  • Fix for calculate taxes with Recurring Invoices by @turbo124 in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/9918
  • Purchase Order Accept Webhook by @turbo124 in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/9923
  • Feature/import quickbooks by @karneaud in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/9917
  • Translations by @turbo124 in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/9924
  • feat: Add YunoHost to self-hosted options by @CodeShakingSheep in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/9931
  • Fixes for inter EU tax rules by @turbo124 in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/9934
  • v5.10.25 by @turbo124 in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/9935

Full Changelog: https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/compare/v5.10.24...v5.10.25
